About.Present: My name is Samir Ehsani and I am a dotnet developer with three years of working experience. I am a hard-working person that never backs down when it comes to challenging work. I like to challenge myself and to learn new technologies and solve different issues. I am a fast learner because I have a good understanding of technology. I have good communication skills and always do great team work.
About.Hobby: I like to play volleyball and socialize with people during my free time. I also like to do fitness and build muscles to look fit and healthy

Title: .Net Developer
Profile: With almost three years of working experience in .Net/Core, UI design and Microsoft SQL Server.

Education.Title: .Net developer
Education.Description:
The Dotnet developer education contains different courses in programming languages. It has given me a good understanding of different technologies. While studying, I did two periods of workplace training for a product company called Else AB. During the workplace training, I learned how to work in a team, developing API, debugging code, designing UI, building services and participate in stand-up and other meetings.

Me and two of my classmates also developed a small application in Blazor for the company. The purpose of this application was to be used in a small warehouse with a few automatic guided vehicles. The company really liked our application and they offered us all three permanent jobs.

Experience.Title: Software Developer
Experience.Description:
Else AB is a Swedish company, based in Gothenburg. Else is developing software for warehouse management systems such as shuttle system management and AGV (automatic guided vehicle). For the past three years, I have worked with Else and developed tailored solutions for many warehouses. As a developer, I worked with different tasks, such as developing the API, user interface, debugging code, maintaining systems, supporting customers, releasing, installing the systems  and testing.

I have always gotten appreciation for my jobs from my boss and colleagues. Please let me know if you would like to contact Else to hear more about me.
